DOC.brief_summary: 1. examine non-inferiority Dysport clinical efficacy safety comparison Botox® , assume bioequivalence ratio 2.5:1 unit , treatment Cervical dystonia . 2. double blind , randomise , multi center , crossover study
DOC.brief_title: A Study Compare Dysport® Botox® Treatment Cervical Dystonia
DOC.detailed_description: 1 . Prospective , randomize , head-to-head , double-blind , cross-over study . 2 . Total patient : A group 51 , B group 51 3 . Study duration : 16 + 4 + 16 week . Eligible patient randomise baseline receive either Dysport® Botox® monitor week 2 , 4 , 8 , 12 , 16 week . After 4 week wash period , patient get treatment ( i.e , Patients get Dysport administer Botox ) 4 . Compare TSUI change score baseline 4 week injection .
DOC.criteria: Patients ≥ 18 year age gender , Cervical dystonia symptom minimum duration 18 month , Negative pregnancy test sexually active woman , Able participate study ( understand goal botulinum toxin A treatment sign Informed Consent Form ) . Patient cervical contracture Known significant underlying dysphasia Patients receive botulinum toxin treatment within past 4 month . Contraindication botulinum toxin treatment Any disease might affect neuromuscular function ( Myasthenia Gravis , EatonLambert syndrome , ALS … ) Patients receive oral antispasticity medication , phenol therapy , myotomy denervation surgery , deep brain stimulation cervical dystonia , Patients require 500 unit Dysport 200 unit Botox . Any concomitant treatment could interfere action botulinum toxin , Subjects participate within last 3 month currently participate investigational drug study , Pregnancy , Lactation .
